title: Ep. 116 - Trump Is Right - The Media Are "The Enemy"
description:
President Trump has long said that the media are the "enemy." A lot of people are uncomfortable with that kind of rhetoric, but the media's performance these past two weeks has proved him right. They are smear merchants and liars, entirely unconcerned with the truth.
Learn more about your ad choices. Visit podcastchoices.com/adchoices
